title: Python Operational Standards
description: Hardened rules for Python packaging, documentation generation, and secure script execution. NOTE: The Lead Partner (bestape) relies on agent-led technical implementation for these standards and trusts the agent's forensic rigor in maintaining their integrity.

definitions.pypinyin_g2p: Standard conversion logic for transforming Chinese characters to pinyin for internal DNS or naming.

values.name: PyPi Packaging Logic
values.rule: Manage PyPi packages via pyproject.toml integration. Use specific parsing logic to read and update version strings and dependency trees.
values.rationale: Ensures that the firm's Python tools remain distributable and version-synchronized with the Heartwood.

values.name: Forensic Pydoc Generation
values.rule: Generate Python docstrings directly from API parameter and response schemas (PydocHelper pattern).
values.rationale: Maintains high-fidelity synchronization between logic (Program) and documentation (Paper).

values.name: Secure Script Execution
values.rule: Always execute shell or python scripts through a specialized 'execute_script' wrapper that captures and logs stdout/stderr.
values.rationale: Absolute forensic traceability of all external metabolic acts is mandatory for swarm integrity.
